file_content.text: I have the second platform secured. Send in the engineers.
On their way.
This is Nadrin. That groundquake is the result of the first team's drilling; expect the tremors to worsen as additional lasers come online.
Are we actually approaching stabilization? Or are we breaking apart the core for nothing?
Is the plan working?
Take care of things here. Any information on the final target?
On my way to the next.
The groundquakes will not impede me. Continue drilling until the core is stabilized.
Do your part; I'll survive.
The last drill platform is surrounded by heavy cannons and the Archon's personal guard: Whiphids and their hunting pets.
We cannot be certain until all three drills are online. But no warning signs yet.
Commander J'Ruush oversaw the gravity hook for the Archon. He was a Whiphid, too.
I fought a Whiphid before, no?
How many Cartel soldiers and mercenaries are on this planet? They must be thinned out by now.
The enemies just keep coming.
The Archon likes them. They're strong, combative and smarter than they look.
Imagine what they're saying about you.
Please secure passage for our engineering team quickly. Now that drilling has begun, our window of opportunity is limited.
The Whiphids and their hounds can locate our people by scent, and even if our engineers get through, the cannons can obliterate the platform as a last resort.
That army isn't meant to kill me. The Archon's trying to slaughter any of our people who get close.
I'm no longer the main target.
He knows he can't stop you, but he can still win.
The wreckage of machines is piled behind me. Dead mercenaries are heaped in my path. The Archon's guard will fall, too. Onward to slaughter!
I'll enjoy the killing.
The last drill platform is surrounded by heavy cannons and the Archon's personal guard: Nikto and their hunting pets.
The Nikto's hounds can locate our people by scent, and even if our engineers get through, the cannons can obliterate the platform as a last resort.
You said the Archon's people are mainly Nikto? What should I expect?
Tell me of the Archon's guard.
Loyalty, dedication, self-sacrifice--traits the Hutts cultivate over generations, since they can't buy them.
